actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt from the highway vehicle excise tax certain equipment specially designed for off-highway seasonal harvesting of agricultural commodities.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the tax relating to heavy trucks and trailers sold at retail, truck trailer and semitrailer bodies designed to: (1) perform off-highway tasks connected with the seasonal harvesting of agricultural commodities; and (2) transport the harvested commodities.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt from the highway vehicle excise tax certain equipment specially designed for off-highway seasonal harvesting of agricultural commodities.
